Day 1 begins.

Charlie: "Based on the evidence I have uncovered, I believe Alice is the mafioso. Let us work together to ensure her true nature does not harm any more of our fellow villagers."

You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why did you wait until after Diana spoke to reveal your 'evidence'? This feels like a setup to eliminate a town member."
